instructions: In a large nonstick skillet, saute the celery, onion and garlic in oil for 3 minutes. Add peppers; cook 3 minutes longer. Stir in tomato sauce, sherry or broth, chili sauce, sugar, basil, oregano and pepper flakes if desired. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 15-20 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Add shrimp; heat through. Serve over rice.
ingredients: 3/4 pound cooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
title: Peppery Shrimp and Rice
